sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnadministrationword ( administ_word_id , administ_word_nm , administ_word_eng_nm , administ_word_abrv_nm , thema_relm , word_se , relate_std_word , administ_word_dfn , administ_word_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #administWordId# , #administWordNm# , #administWordEngNm# , #administWordAbrvNm# , #themaRelm# , #wordSe# , #relateStdWord# , #administWordDfn# , #administWordDc# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnadministrationword SET administ_word_id = #administWordId# , administ_word_nm = #administWordNm# , administ_word_eng_nm = #administWordEngNm# , administ_word_abrv_nm = #administWordAbrvNm# , thema_relm = #themaRelm# , word_se = #wordSe# , relate_std_word = #relateStdWord# , administ_word_dfn = #administWordDfn# , administ_word_dc = #administWordDc# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND administ_word_id = #administWordId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnadministrationword WHERE 1 = 1 AND administ_word_id = #administWordId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT administ_word_id , administ_word_nm , administ_word_eng_nm , administ_word_abrv_nm , thema_relm , word_se , relate_std_word , administ_word_dfn , administ_word_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNADMINISTRATIONWORD WHERE administ_word_id = #administWordId#

SELECT A.ADMINIST_WORD_ID , A.ADMINIST_WORD_NM , A.ADMINIST_WORD_ENG_NM , A.ADMINIST_WORD_ABRV_NM , A.THEMA_RELM , A.WORD_SE , A.RELATE_STD_WORD , A.ADMINIST_WORD_DFN , A.ADMINIST_WORD_DC , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT ADMINIST_WORD_ID , ADMINIST_WORD_NM , ADMINIST_WORD_ENG_NM , ADMINIST_WORD_ABRV_NM , THEMA_RELM , WORD_SE , RELATE_STD_WORD , ADMINIST_WORD_DFN , ADMINIST_WORD_DC , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNADMINISTRATIONWORD WHERE 1=1
ADMINIST_WORD_ID = #searchKeyword#
ADMINIST_WORD_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ADMINIST_WORD_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNADMINISTRATIONWORD WHERE 1=1
ADMINIST_WORD_ID = #searchKeyword#
ADMINIST_WORD_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
